output_list.description: The mintToken function does not check if the resulting balance of the target address would exceed the maximum value of a uint256. This could lead to an integer overflow, which could result in the loss of funds.
The sell function does not check if the resulting balance of the contract would exceed the maximum value of a uint256. This could lead to an integer overflow, which could result in the loss of funds.

The setPrices function does not check if the resulting values of sellTokenPerEther and buyTokenPerEther would exceed the maximum value of a uint256. This could lead to an integer overflow, which could result in the loss of funds.
The totalContribution variable is not checked for overflow when it is updated in the _transfer function. This could lead to an integer overflow, which could result in the loss of funds.
The totalBonusTokensIssued variable is not checked for overflow when it is updated in the _transfer function. This could lead to an integer overflow, which could result in the loss of funds.
